pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Collection contains scripts for radio programs in which Al Jolson, Bert Lahr, Fanny Brice, Eddie Cantor, Red Skelton, Tommy Dorsey and others starred, including Whose Baby Are You, Chase and Sanborn Hour, Baby Snooks, Circus Night in Town, Kraft Music Hall and Lifebuoy Soap. See online finding aid for list of programs and dates. See also separate Freedman collection that includes scripts in the Arts Library, Special Collections.
